title: just need to know
body: ok so i stopped playing for awhile just recently started again but just woundering why i cant spectate games anymore like its there but wont let me click it it not lighting up or anything i thought maby gota wait 5 mins so i tryed it on another friends game and he was 20 mins in still wouldnt let me do it can anyone help me and yes i can not spell to save my life if ur just going to give me shit go away and 1 more question why cant i see anyone elses honor lvl
